Summary: Admin input correct Adminname and password
Action Step:
1. Open https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/
2. Input correct Adminname
3. Input correct pasword
4. Click button Login
Expected Result:
1. Succes Login
2. Direct to menu PIM with tab Employee List
3. Show field employee
4. Show list of employee

Summary: Admin input incorrect  Adminname and incorrect password
Action Step:
1. Open https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/
2. Input incorrect Adminname
3. Input incorrect pasword
4. Click button Login
Expected Result:
1. Failed to login
2. Show ticker error with text "Invalid credentials" and  icon info (i)

Action Step:
1. Open https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/
2. CLick CTA Forgot Your Password on login page
3. Input new Adminname
4. Click button Reset Password
Expected Result: 1. Direct to Pop-up succesfully reset password
